page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative generate week method

argument.name: week
argument.description: The delta in weeks between two dates.

return.name: week
return.description: The correctly formatted representation of the delta in weeks.

page.description: Method used to generate how weeks should be representation in a relative date. For example turning "1" into "1 week", and "3" into "3 weeks". See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.
